summary: A Mafia boss trains his mentally impaired son as his successor.
cast: Harvey Keitel|Jocelin Donahue|Blake Clark|Jason Mewes|Michael Rispoli|Jon Polito|Debra Mooney|Michele Specht|Jack Kehler|John Pinette|Paul Hipp|Matthew J Cates|Stephanie Danielson|Keegan Boos|Robert Amico|Edith Fields|Jannette Bloom|Calvin Dean|John Cirigliano|Hyung-rae Shim|Michelle Maniscalco|Gus Lynch|Frank Scozzari|Roger Stoneburner|Tatiana Sarasty|Christian Victor|Logan Shea|Richard Bernard|Tristen Bankston|Mark Alexander Herz|Rob Tepper|Joshua Rosenthal|Lala Kanian|Jeff Bornstein|Wonder Girls|Julia Farsadi|Tom Brangle|Matt Mann|Rahman Dalrymple|Tony Pinizzotto|Neva Cole|Angelica Montesano|Olivia Presley|Larry Russo|Arne Starr|Gina Tleel
title: The Last Godfather
